select id, name, parent from category where parent is null

WITH recursive cte AS ( SELECT id, NAME, parent FROM category WHERE parent = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT c.id, c.name, c.parent FROM category AS c INNER JOIN cte ON c.parent = cte.id ) SELECT id, parent, NAME FROM cte;
